label: kind/upgrade-consideration
impact/high
notes.text: If using edge-24.5.2 with the Linkerd CNI plugin on GKE, you must explicitly disable IPv6 or use edge-24.5.5 instead.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Installing this release without setting enableHttpRoutes to false will install the grpcroute.gateway.networking.k8s.io CRD, which will be removed when Linkerd is uninstalled.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added IPv6 support for the destination controller.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added inbound policy index metrics with size gauges for each resource index.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed linkerd dg endpoints to work with IPv6.

label: kind/upgrade-consideration
kind/deprecation
impact/medium
notes.text: Reverted the fix for the destination staleness issue with EndpointSlices.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Set backend_not_found route status when any backends are not found.
